query:
SELECT 
  pu.statName,
  pu.statIncrease,
  pu.metadata
FROM player_upgrades pu
JOIN players p ON p.id = pu.playerId
WHERE p.name = 'OG Anunoby'
AND pu.upgradeType = 'attribute'
AND JSON_EXTRACT(pu.metadata, '$.upgradeType') = '7GM'
ORDER BY pu.statName, pu.createdAt

  pu.statName,
  pu.statIncrease,
  pu.metadata
FROM player_upgrades pu
JOIN players p ON p.id = pu.playerId
WHERE p.name = 'OG Anunoby'
AND pu.upgradeType = 'attribute'
AND JSON_EXTRACT(pu.metadata, '$.upgradeType') = '7GM'
ORDER BY pu.statName, pu.createdAt
